basic.description:
The course will focus on the study of Italian Romanticism and its relation to English, German, Spanish and French Romanticism. The rise of Realism and Decadentism will also be discussed and examined.
NOTE    Taught in English together with LLCU 232/3.0. Students concentrating in Italian submit written assignments, tests and examinations in Italian. Normally students will read Italian texts in the original.
basic.subject: ITLN
basic.title: From the Romantics to D'annunzio

extra.enrollment_requirement:
Prerequisite    ITLN205
Exclusion    No more than 3.0 units from ITLN232; ITLN432; LLCU232.
